inbodydescription.para: TODO: fetch the accounts specified via other_auths as well.
TODO: recursively check one layer deeper in the authority tree for keys

TODO: if transaction has enough signatures to be "valid" don't add any more, there are cases where the wallet may have more keys than strictly necessary and the transaction will be rejected if the transaction validates without requiring all signatures provided
